title: Against Her Other Love
description: On an island ruled by women, a lonely boy gets an unexpected chance at love, but a callous Casanova ruins it.Mario--his strong, confident friend, and an opponent of the matriarchy regime--attempts to coach him in matters of the heart.Mario soon discovers his own gorgeous girlfriend is being swept off her feet, by the same smooth-talking rival.To his further dismay, he will have to fight for his love by dueling in the upcoming stun-sword tournament.
author: Alan Stroe
